articles.title: Christy Lam
articles.contents:
Christy Lam
          
          
          Home
          Portfolio
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Christy Lam
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Hi there!
            I am a data programmer and analyst with the Puget Sound Regional Council
            (PSRC). As a member of the data science team, I work on
            general automation projects, dashboard building, and
            promoting R (see my post on why I like
            R). When not dabbling in code, I’m catching up on the
            latest K-drama, anime, and admiring beautiful UI
            designs.
            
            Education
            Certificate in Front-end Development
            University of Washington Professional and Continuing
            Education, 2020
            BA in Geography (Geographic Information Systems)
            University of Washington, 2007
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Christy Lam
